articles.author: Virendra Singh Rawat
articles.title: Plans afoot to develop Noida-like industrial city in UP's Bundelkhand
articles.description: The Uttar Pradesh government has started work on its plan to set up new industrial, residential and commercial townships in Bundelkhand to develop the sparsely-populated region synonymous with parched landmass and teeming job-seekers on the lines of Noida.

articles.title: Opinion: Budget 2024 - BJP Government Signalling A Break From Freebie Raj?
